column1: Table 6.9: Summary of cost of rehabilitation of tanks located in MWS-024

column2: Desilting channels by PC 20 or 30 Excavator in a loose soil without pontoon cutting depth 300mm

Earth excavation from borrow area by Excavator and forming tank bund including transporting, placing (150-225) mm  layers, watering, compacting and trimming  as per instructions (haulage up to 01 km) - for Filling potholes and depressions
Renovations to the spill and toe wall

Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
